Name: What A Pear
Ingredients: 40 ml Belle de Brillet pear liqueur
10 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
4 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with pear wedge on rim.
Review: Peated whisky lifts my Pear Drop cocktail from being a sweetie to being more a cocktail suited to an old salt. (I nearly named this Pear Drop in the Ocean.)
History: Created in September 2024 by yours truly.
Nutrition: One serving of What A Pear contains 176 calories
